Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Welcome to the #komodo-team channel (this was previously known as #team-marketing).

We moved this channel up to this 'community lounge' category so it's more accessable. We archived other team channels so now it's just this one. In other words, all that discussion can now happen on this single channel.

We are also trying to improve the Discord experience and moved few things around. Let us know if you like the new approach and how we could further improve the user experience.

Author: joe2x4#5987
Content: I struggle with the same thing that others do in regard to the frustration of kmd price and perceived market value. It hasn't been very clear over the years exactly what sets kmd apart from the other coins. To the public the other coins are easier to understand and easy to market , hence easy to speculate. Kmd changes so fast is harder for the public to pin down exactly what it is, ICO platform, decentralized DEX, DPOW service, CC, etc. This I assume is why the Ideas by Nature was brought in to do rebrand. The harder concept to get across though seems to be kmd is advertising to projects as a place to build, and the projects through advertising themselves ultimately advertise kmd and userbase grows. The thing for anxious speculators to do seems to be either help advertise to new projects, or support the projects that are appearing so as they can naturally be the ones to market kmd. Ie: Help advertise chainmakers, pirate, k64, redfoxlabs, etc

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
righ, we are trying to address this on the rebrand and think about how we should explain KMD – the currency.

I am trying to find the right concepts & words to describe what we have.

I think it's semi-public info that KMD will have sidechains. Any CC-module can be turned into a new KMD sidechain. The cool thing is that anyone can launch these sidechains, so it's truly open source / open / permissionless.

How should we explain this so that the average crypto enthusiast understands and gets exited?

Should we simply talk about "side chains"? But then that could be confused with all the other "independent chains" that we have on the Komodo ecosystem.

So I was thinking what if we talk about KMD "feature extensions", and that KMD is modular money that anyone can extend with new features (unlike the other coins).

Would that make sense? What type of words/language do you guys think would work here?

Author: Audo#5667
Content: also jl77 has addressed this general topic in his post: https://medium.com/@jameslee777/tokenomics-are-for-tokens-not-for-coins-3f262d0aa4b3

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Another concept I was thinking is to talk about how the *platform* and the *currency* are in a mutually beneficial symbiosis

> Most platforms are dependent on their ecosystem currency to power the platform; on Komodo it is not the case. Both the KMD currency and all the projects of the platform can exist on their own, yet they have a synergetic relationship.

--> then we describe *How The Platform will benefit the currency*

--> and *How The Currency will benefit the platform*

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: I think there has to be appeal to the non technical. If I’m trying to sell Komodo to an investor who really doesn’t know anything about crypto, telling them that it has asset chains and dpow will not win them over. However, if I say: they’re launching an online casino, a gaming platform and offering blockchain as a service to help incubate  other crypto projects (as an example) then they may be inclined to drop a few bucks.

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: I’m not here to criticize, I’m here to help if I can.

Author: grumpygoron#4320
Content: @Dr Debt agreed.  The marketing push needs to be for the easy to explain basics that get people excited.  Those who are interested in the more technical developments will seek them out.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
yes, so what do you guys think we we would say:

**KMD is the money of Komodo ecosystem that anyone can extend with new features and functionality** Then we list some of these feature extensions, such as stable coin extension, privacy extension, a decentralized casino extension, ...

then we can explain that any new technology that is developed on Komodo Platform can be applied to KMD as another extension.

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Why will KMD succeed?

1. KMD is the base currency of our atomic swap technology
2. KMD can get unlimited amount of new features via side chains (that we could call feature extensions)
3. KMD has utility within the Komodo Platform such as through the Komodo Platform services (dPoW, soon interoperability)

How does the Komodo Platform & ecosystem help KMD?

4. Platform business & developer adoption brings in new technology innovations that KMD can adopt
5. Ecosystem business adoptio drives users to the ecosystem, which then likely become KMD users as well
6. Businesses & projects of the Komodo ecosystem can rely on KMD to be intermediary currency everyone uses and trusts. All new Komodo based products & services will likely accept KMD

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: This is where a community growth team helps. Someone who can explain it in it’s simplest way to people who don’t have a clue how this works. Education is a great part of building user base

Author: Audo#5667
Content: are there other points we could raise up?

Author: Audo#5667
Content: plus KMD is secure and scalable currency

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: I ask this question: If you gave me that response as to why I should buy kmd, why would I?

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: Do you want to know what I’ve gotten people invested in Komodo with? Comparison to Eth. My angle is almost always the same: here they are side by side. Now Eth is xxx value currently but Komodo is only x, which multiplier will be better?

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: In the end people care much more about money than they do tech.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: at least if I consider buying some coin I want to understand its usecases and why people would want to hold it. Do I need to understand Komodo Platform technology? Not really, if it's generally understood as a solid platform that is gaining business & developer adoption. Then I mainly want to know how KMD relates to the platform and why the success of the platform will spill over to the KMD currency itself.

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content: Sales driven marketing will do much more than tech driven marketing

Content: Just my 2 sats

Author: Dr Debt#0891
Content:
Why will kmd succeed?

We will succeed through adoption. Through creating a user base that developers can access via our community. P2P transaction along with  b2b and b2c transactions will allow us to scale tx speed along with user base as we gain traction. This creates a snowball effect. While you may not notice a few flakes of snow now, you cannot ignore the avalanche that is inevitable.
